snippet: The exhibition, “16th-Century La Española: Glimpses of the First Blacks in the Early Colonial Americas,” draws from the archives of the university’s Dominican Studies Institute.
abstract: Exhibition on view at City University of New York documents lives of first black Africans to live in Dominican Republic.
lead_paragraph: The exhibition, “16th-Century La Española: Glimpses of the First Blacks in the Early Colonial Americas,” draws from the archives of the university’s Dominican Studies Institute.

headline.main: CUNY Exhibition Documents Lives of Black Africans in Early Dominican Republic
headline.print_headline: Telling Stories of First Blacks to Live in Dominican Republic
